problem: 如图,已知△ABC中,AB=AC,AH⊥BC于H,等边△BDF的顶点F在BC上,DF交AH于点E,若BF=8,BC=10,则DE的长为()
answer: 解:如图,∵在△ABC中,AB=AC,AH⊥BC,BC=10,∴BH=\frac{1}{2}BC=5．又∵△BDF是等边三角形,且BF=8,∴BF=DF=8,∠EFH=60°,∴HF=BF-BH=8-5=3,∴直角△EHF中,∠HEF=30°,则EF=2HF=6,∴DE=BF-2HF=8-6=2,即DE=2．故选:B．
comment: 本题考查了等腰三角形的性质和等边三角形的性质．注意等腰三角形的"三线合一"性质的运用．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that in △ABC, AB = AC, AH ⊥ BC at H, the vertex F of equilateral △BDF is on BC, and DF intersects AH at point E. If BF = N_0, BC = N_1, then the length of DE is ()
